page.title: 09 Questionaire (2)
page.content: This question was"What is the most important world issue". The main answer was War& peace. The next answer was the release of the hostages held by terrorist groups. {"What do you think of Tresillian's {road"} Most people said that the road is dangerous and vehicles go over the speed limit . Older people said the road is crowded,very busy and they need a bypass and a crossing. The younger people said the same things. Only a few people said that the road is alright as it is. {"What do you think of todays {fashions?" }Most people said that today's fashions very imaginative. Many people were not interested in today's fashions and said that they were too far fetched. We found that old people did not like them.
